I am **Senior Clinical Data Analyst** for the Clinical Pharmacy team of [Providence Swedish Medical Center](https://www.swedish.org/) in the Puget Sound area.

I am an **Adjunct Instructor** for the [Doctor of Educational Leadership program in the School of Education at Gonzaga University](https://www.gonzaga.edu/school-of-education/graduate/doctor-of-educational-leadership).

I am also a **Research Associate** for the [Social & Economic Sciences Research Center at Washington State University](https://sesrc.wsu.edu/).
